descriptionHTML:
This is simply the best weather app for your region... and the rest of the world.

- Gorgeous and realistic animations of weather conditions
- See at a glance the next weather condition change

- Updated continuously
- Accurate hourly forecasts for the next 10 days
- Fast, beautiful and simple to use
- Detailed forecasts on rain, ice, snow, fog, wind, storm, dew point, UV index, humidity, pressure
- Highest and lowest historical values
- Satellite and radar map animations
- Optimized for both phones and tablets

- Live Wallpaper
- Weather in notification area and temperature in status bar
- Great widget for your home screen

And it’s all free.

Try it now !

Cities: New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Houston, Philadelphia, Phoenix, San Antonio, San Diego, Dallas, San Jose, Austin and all the others!

topReviews.reviewText: This is one of (if not the best) weather app I've tried. I would love to upgrade to pro version but WOW It's Mega expensive for what it is. Sorry dev. Don't let that put you off downloading this app because the free version is still fantastic.

Weather reports are quite accurate and I like the ability of tapping on the clock to open the android clock/alarm directly. My issue is that the clock only updates in the widget once per hour. Would also prefer to have the ability to refresh the weather directly on the widget as well as be able to set the weather update rates to (30 min, 1 hr, 2 hrs, etc) If the clock issue is fixed and missing items were added to the app, then I would give it 5 stars. Note: My other clock widgets update the time correctly.
This might be the best weather app so far. Definitely not going to buy the full version but the free version is excellent.
I do like the sound effects, but don't care for the display of the app. It's okay. 👌

Tried this app after seeing recent positive reviews. I was confused about adding cities since most apps use the  add button or elipses so I emailed late last night and woke up with a response. How awesome is that? Add to that, I thought I could not make the widget transparent but I toggled the gradient and BAM!! there it is.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Gave up on devnet weather app...

topReviews.reviewText: This has got to be one of the best, with customizable widgets and very accurate, would of given a 5* but the price to upgrade is to expensive just to remove a tiny weeny ad that you don't see unless you open the app and it doesn't effect the app at all and there's no ad intrusion on the widget. Drop the price to £1/ £1.20 and I would deffo upgrade...keep up the good work guys...8)

When customizing for a 5.5 in. device, the white font color lands directly in the middle of the sun animation. Making it impossible to read. Can be solved by offsetting the size of the app or moving it anywhere on the screen. I have emailed the devs to check if this font color customization is on the way. The other widget customization options plus the actual weather readings are already top notch. Accurate within +/- 1 degree from BoM readings so really superb. Definitely 5 stars if font-color is included.
Just one small tip to improve further: the icons in the small versions of the widget are hard to distinguish, they should be bigger. Btw This one's my app of choice for weather forecasts
This app works perfectly on my tablet. The layout is attractive and easy to use.

Downloaded this app after my favorite weather and clock widget went to hell. This one is a beautiful replacement, with accurate weather and a beautiful design. There is a little learning curve to get everything looking the way I like but it still only took about 5 minutes to dial everything in. Love the app. Keep up the good work.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Does what it supposed to do.

topReviews.reviewText: Maybe I've been spoiled by my other free apps, but the severe lack of customization (especially resizing in Nova) prevents me from falling in love.
Very nice graphics and quick screen response.  The love wallpaper is awesome.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Nice app Pro version is worth it!

topReviews.reviewText: Love this aap, perfect n accurate weather prediction, and sounds and graphics are superb
I do not care about the city name, but why do you need to put in incorrect address. That is not mine. Can you just do Suitland, Md 20746. This is the correct one
Look good, not hard to set up, but once you set up widget can't figure out how to get back in to change settings.
But there are no current condition on 4x1 widget (only mix/max for today). And there no information anywhere when was last update (as for me)... And no setting for update rate?
All the symbols are a bit confusing at first. But you get used to them. Background animations are lovely will upgrade to pro if the forecasts are as accurate as pretty ;)

I really love the look of the widget, although it would be perfect to have a 4x1 widget that displays the clock & weather on the 4x1.  The left for the clock, center current weather icon, right side for the current weather words & location. And a new 4x2 widget just like the 4x1 I just mentioned, only adding the extended section to the bottom of it. The current 4x3 is just too large for my front home screen. But, it is beautiful & quite lovely. Thank you
topReviews.reviewTitle: Love it, except, it needs more widget options- (KitKat)

topReviews.reviewText: I really liked the look of this applicatio. But the settings were not extensive enough and it never worked properly. It always  showed either the wrong weather for my location or the wrong location. Uninstalled.

One of the few weather apps that I've used that's accurate and has enough customization options to make it aesthetically pleasing, whether you want a minimalist look or want to go full on eyecandy mode.  Only gave it 4 stars due to it not always updating every so often
This is a great app for weather.  Love the animation and sound effects! Very accurate.
It gives you clearer 3D pictures and an hourly detail of weather data. It also gives you 10 days weather forcast with 3D pictures. You can also add cities to view their weather at all time
I've tried out many different Weather Widgets. This app, as far as functionality and streamline design go, is the best one I've used by far. Definitely a keeper.

I've made this my sole weather app that is a widget on my home screen.  My only suggestion is to make adding locations easier.  Maybe a search option and then be able to sort the locations as to what's important rather than alphabetical.
A little off sometimes but nothing is ever 100% ,, its close enough
Accurate, great graphics and full of useful info!

I downloaded primarily for the weather clock widgets shown in description image, but they don't seem  to exist. At least they don't appear in my widgets folder, and or anywhere else that is obvious. UPDATE: widgets showed up only after uninstall/reinstall and device restart. Everything looks and works well now.
Really well done weather app and weather / clock widget. Updates reliably and easy to set up and use.
You can only get weather for London or New York unless you leave the GPS on. Yuck!
Love the features, the options for different size display and the customization of background colors and love the animations..
Love this app. How do you delete cities you no longer want?

I would like to suggest the following...Color coded radar for different types of precipitation. Replace the chirping birds (at night) with an owl. 😊 Have the snow accumulate on the bottom of the screen!
So far so good. Accurate and nice looking. Hope it'll stay like this.
Such a good app, particularly as it provides wind in Beaufort scale
I've tried so many different weather apps I've actually lost track. But this one is amazing. The levels of weather detail are extraordinary. Some navigation tweaks might make it better.

Excellent app, very good information, appears to be very accurate and I like the 10 day forecast. Moved over from Devnet weather widget when it wouldn't update, this one is much better and more informative.
Perhaps another widget that has current temp and 3 day forecast? You have a 4 by 1 forecast one but doesn't have current temp. Would be cool if you could.
Quite accurate after testing for a week
Tried other weather apps but they either duck or drain the battery, with this one until have had neither of these problems
Really like the background and live wallpaper.  Would like to be able to see sunrise and moon phase for other days and the hourly/10 day forecast screens could use a renovation.

whatsNewHTML:
What's New

- New setting, choose the order of the temperature display
- Widget, current time now visible if alarm is shown
- Data connection optimization
- Various small fixes
whatsNew: - New setting, choose the order of the temperature display- Widget, current time now visible if alarm is shown- Data connection optimization- Various small fixes
